greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 1/2 + half of the (n+1)-st component of the continued fraction expansion of sum(k>=1,1/3^(2^k)).
comment: To construct the sequence use the rule : a(1)=3, then a(a(1)+a(2)+...+a(n)+1)=2+(-1)^n and fill in any undefined place with 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192 (computed from the b-file of A004200 provided by _Harry J. Smith_)
example: Example to illustrate the comment : a(a(1)+1) = a(4) = 2+(-1)^1 = 1 and a(2), a(3) are undefined. The rule forces a(2) = a(3) = 2.
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Nov 08 2003
